ComicInfo.Summary:
"Dead Man's Hand," Part One
Start of a new story arc. Bobby Pope is a con man and petty criminal. He's also a psychic. He makes a living fleecing marks through card games, street fights and other scams. Aided by his abilities, he can't lose...until he crosses paths with a group of narcotics officers with more on their minds than catching criminals.
ComicInfo.Title: The Report; Dead Man's Hand Part 1
